entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
